output_list.criticism: The function withdrawForeignTokens can be reentered by calling it from the token contract, allowing an attacker to steal the contract's ether.
The function enablePurchasing is not protected by a modifier, allowing anyone to call it.
The function disablePurchasing is not protected by a modifier, allowing anyone to call it.
The function getStats is not protected by a modifier, allowing anyone to call it.
The function transfer can be reentered by calling it from the token contract, allowing an attacker to steal the contract's ether.
The function transferFrom can be reentered by calling it from the token contract, allowing an attacker to steal the contract's ether.
The function approve is not protected by a modifier, allowing anyone to call it.
